about_the_game:
When war erupts over the lands of Ansalon, you don't just move characters...You move entire armies!

Welcome to the first D&D computer wargame. Prepare for fierce battles and all-out war when the forces of Whitestone clash against the evil Highlord Dragonarmies. The prize: absolute rule over all Ansalon on the Dragonlance game world of Krynn.

  • Strategic, overview and tactical screens show the land of Ansalon on the Dragonlance game world of Krynn.
  • Live the War of the Lance saga thought combat, diplomacy and conquest.
  • March into battle against flying citadels, elves, dragons, griffins, draconian, dwarves, minotaurs and more.
  • Watch each battle unfold as units fight on a detailed tactical map.
  • Send hero characters on quests to discover the secrets of magical items which will be needed to win the game.

Let the war begin!
